icon-picker-dialog.base64-hint: Tignitin n usettenggel n Base64 i d-yettaken abrid fessusen akken ad ternuḍ kra n tignit ɣer wumuɣen-ik·im. Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ ameẓlu am [www.base64-image.de]({{link}} iwakken ad tselkteḍ tugna i tebɣiḍ ɣer uzrar yettwasetgel s base64. Annect-a yettedu ula i tugniwin gift imrayen!
icon-picker-dialog.reload-button-tooltip: Ales asali n isental n tignitin meṛṛa
icon-picker-dialog.hint: Lmed [dagi]({{link}}) amek ara ternuḍ neɣ ad d-tesnulfuḍ isental-ik·im n tignit.

achievements-dialog.reset-confirmation-title: D tidet tebɣiḍ ad talseḍ awennez n usfari?
achievements-dialog.reset-confirmation-message: Akk iseḍruyen d ufara n yiswiren ad ruḥen. Tigawt-agi ulamek ara ad tettwasemmet.
achievements-dialog.title: Iseḍruyen
achievements-dialog.no-completed-achievements: Mazal ur tfukkeḍ ara akk yakan iseḍruyen.
achievements-dialog.reset-button-tooltip: Ales awennez n meṛṛa n iseḍruyen d usfari n iswiren

settings.restore-general-settings-warning-title: D tidet tebɣiḍ ad d-terreḍ iɣewwaṛen imuta?
settings.restore-general-settings-error-title: Yecceḍ usali n aḥraz n yiɣewwaren imuta!
settings.restore-general-settings-success-message: Iɣewwaṛen-ik·im imuta ttwarran-d seg ufaylu n weḥraz.
settings.restore-menu-settings-warning-title: D tidet tebɣiḍ ad d-terreḍ iɣewwaṛen n wumuɣ?
settings.restore-menu-settings-warning-message: Ayagi ad isemselsi umuɣen-ik·im amiran akked tigrummiwin n wumuɣen s igburen n ufaylu n weḥraz yettwafernen!
settings.restore-menu-settings-error-title: Yecceḍ usali n weḥraz n wumuɣen!
settings.restore-menu-settings-success-message: Umuɣen-ik·im akked tigrummiwin n wumuɣ ttwarran-d seg ufaylu n weḥraz.

general-settings-dialog.check-for-new-versions-info: Ma yermed, Kando ad d-yesken tilɣa mi ara yili lqem amaynut.
general-settings-dialog.invisible-settings-button-info: Mazal tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ taqeffalt, ad d-tban mi ara tesmuttiḍ taɣerdayt sufella-as.
general-settings-dialog.settings-button-position-info: Fren tiɣmert n ugdil anda ara d-yettwasken tqeffalt n yiɣewwaṛen.
general-settings-dialog.settings-window-color-scheme-info: Ma tferneḍ ' Anagraw', asfaylu n yiɣewwaṛen ad sqedcen azenziɣ n yini am win n unagraw-ik·im n wammud.
general-settings-dialog.settings-window-color-scheme: Iɣewwaṛen n uzenziɣ n yini n usfaylu
general-settings-dialog.settings-window-flavor-info: Ma tferneḍ lbenna tafrawant, issefk ad talseḍ asenker n usfaylu n iɣewwaṛen akken ad tesneseḍ asemdu.
general-settings-dialog.tray-icon-flavor-info: Tzemreḍ daɣen ad tferneḍ ad teffreḍ tignit n ufeggag n waddad.
general-settings-dialog.tray-icon-flavor: Lbenna n tignit ufeggag n waddad

introduction-dialog.slide3-hint1: Tzemreḍ daɣen ad tsiteḍ dagi akken ad tmedleḍ umuɣ.
introduction-dialog.slide3-hint2: Sit anida tebɣiḍ dagi akken ad tferneḍ aferdis.
introduction-dialog.slide3-text: Deg Kando, ** agdil-ik·im akk d asiti anican**! Ur tesriḍ ara ad tḥakṛeḍ tignitin, tzemreḍ ad tsiteḍ anda tebɣiḍ deg uḥric n ukerdis. Aya yettarra iferdisen d imellilen ugar.
introduction-dialog.slide4-text: Umuɣ anaddaw **dima yezga** yeldi ɣer usewwaṛ n tɣerdayt-ik·im. **Ur teḥwaǧeḍ ara ad teṛjuḍ merru akken ad tfaked* *. Eg laman deg tkatut-ik·im sakin kcem ɣer ufran-ik·im!
introduction-dialog.slide5-hint: Sit anida tebɣiḍ dagi akken ad taliḍ deg uswir.
introduction-dialog.slide5-text: Akken ad **tuɣaleḍ ɣer deffir**, tekki ɣef tneccabt tamarawt, neɣ di tlemmast n wumuɣ.
introduction-dialog.slide6-text: Akka, tzemreḍ ad tesnirmeḍ taɣessa n wumuɣ s tɣawla.
introduction-dialog.slide7-title: Uɣal d arurad: Askar n tecreḍt
introduction-dialog.slide7-text: Sit sakin zuɣer ɣef uferdis akken ad tkecmeḍ ɣer uskar n tecreḍt. **Ma tḥebseḍ amussu usewwaṛ neɣ tgeḍ tuzzya, umuɣ annadaw yettwazuɣren ad yeldi!** Cfu ɣef ubrid ɣer uferdis syin tessunɣeḍ-tt s yimussuten infalan s wudem azigzag.
introduction-dialog.slide8-text: **Umuɣ yettarra-d i tigawin-ik·im n tɣerdayt!** Umuɣ anaddaw yeldi ma tebɣiḍ ad yeldi. S kra usleɣmu, ad tizmireḍ ad tferneḍ iferdisen war ma tmuqleḍ ula ɣer wumuɣ.
introduction-dialog.slide9-text: Ma **teǧǧiḍ annal ɣef tqeffalt** (am Ctrl_, _Shift_, neɣ _Alt_) seld mi teldiḍ umuɣ, tzemreḍ ad tgeḍ tafrayt s usmutti n usewweṛ. Ulac asiti neɣ azuɣer yettwasra.
introduction-dialog.slide10-text: **Ur ttraǧu ara imrayen ad fakken!** Awi-d kan inig s wudem azigzag deg wumuɣ. D wa i d abrid arurad akk ad tferneḍ iferdisen!
introduction-dialog.slide12-text: Kando d win i d-yufraren s waggan s wudem afellay. Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ ayagi akken ad teldiḍ isnasen, ifuyla, ad ttuselkmen imakṛuyen n unasiw, akked aṭas n tɣawsiwin-nniḍen. Tzemreḍ ad [tesnifleḍ aɣanib n umuɣ]({{link1}}), [rnu tignit n yisental]({{link2}}) akk daɣen [aseqdec n imesli]({{link3}}) deg wumuɣen-ik·im!
